name: Daily Delivery
overview:
Daily Home Delivery Services is a social venture start-up established in Vancouver, British Columbia . The company aims to provide a range of services in which it primarily involves the act of delivery. Our main goal is to facilitate the daily household and business chores/errands for individuals and corporations by allowing them the convenience of ordering goods, and demanding delivery services securely and instantly through our Website , Mobile App or Phone, and have it delivered directly to their desired destination.

By allowing all individuals to save time and money, Daily Delivery strives to raise the quality of living in metropolitan cities. Having in mind Vancouver’s “2020 greenest city Action plan” initiative, we have also adopted a sustainable and emission-free solution to go about our delivery process by utilizing fully electric trikes.

Grocery Delivery Dry cleaning (Pickup and Drop-off) Food Delivery Liquor & Tobacco Delivery Errands Services Package Pickup and Drop-off Gift Delivery
